definition: disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: Fourth, we should further strengthen cooperation in disaster prevention and mitigation, and post-disaster reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 第四，進一步加強防災減災和災後重建合作。

sentences.english: Since fire and water have no mercy people should be alert for disasters.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲水火無情，所以人們都應提高防災意識。

sentences.english: Formulate disaster prevention and mitigation plans and strengthen disaster monitoring and early warning.
sentences.chinese: 制定完善防災減災預案，加強災害監測預警。

sentences.english: Hundreds of health professionals worldwide have been trained in emergency preparedness.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地有許多衛生專業人員接受了防災應急培訓。

sentences.english: Earthquake Prediction is a main course for students majoring in disaster prevention.
sentences.chinese: 地震預報課程是防災技術系學生的一門主要專業課。

sentences.english: IEE carried out the seismic disaster prevention planning for Jinxian County of Jiangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 江西省進賢縣抗震防災規劃，由抗震所完成。

sentences.english: These results can provide a decision-making basis for disaster prevention and evacuation of urban residents.
sentences.chinese: 該研究結果可爲城市居民防災避難提供決策依據。

sentences.english: We will continue to make earnest effort to strengthen disaster prevention and mitigation.
sentences.chinese: 我們要繼續紮紮實實加強防災減災工作。

sentences.english: Fourth, carefully carry out emergency exercises to enhance the level of mine disaster prevention and resilience.
sentences.chinese: 四是認真開展應急演練活動，提升礦井防災抗災水平。

sentences.english: Basic frame of Urban planning theories for disaster preventing are put forward in the end.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了城市防災規劃理論初步框架。

sentences.english: Urban disaster prevention is an important part of a harmonious society.
sentences.chinese: 城市防災救災是和諧社會的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Landslide predicting and forcasting is one of effect measures to lessen and prevent calamity .
sentences.chinese: 對滑坡進行預測預報是減災防災的重要措施之一。

sentences.english: Undertake take precautions against natural calamities prevents the another obligation that caustic job is an underwriter actively.
sentences.chinese: 積極進行防災防損工作是保險人的又一義務。

sentences.english: So the significance of urban disaster-prevention system planning is very obvious.
sentences.chinese: 因此城市防災空間的規劃建設研究是極具實際意義的。

sentences.english: The building fire prevention is a vital part of building disaster prevention.
sentences.chinese: 建築防火是建築防災的一個重要分支。

definition: to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to meet a contingency/to adapt oneself to changes
preparedness/to bring sth to a state of readiness
to respond to an emergency/to meet a contingency/(attributive) emergency
to dispatch (vehicles, staff etc)/to schedule/to manage/dispatcher/scheduler
